short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set a custom new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is for Customized google homepage for BTS fans. It consists of various parts, but mainly it shows lastest tweets of bts, youtube video, and goods at the local market. Also, fans can save their dates of being the BTS fan. This data is saved at the backend server, the user is identified via google oauth login.
